TS

Class TrafficSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • TS.TrafficSystem

  • public class TrafficSystem
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrafficSystem(int r0, int r12, int flight, int tlight, int ccar)
      Makes a trafficsystem with the seleceted inputs for the lanes, lights and the chance of a car arriving.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getcarsin()
      Counts how many cars that drive into the roads.
      int getcarsout()
      Counts how many cars that drive out from the roads.
      int getforward()
      count how many cars that drive forward.
      int getleft()
      Count how many cars that turn left.
      int getMax()
      calculates the maximum time it takes a car to go thru the system.
      int getTotal()
      calculates the average time it takes a car to go thru the system.
      void print()
      Prints out the simulation of the traffic system which includes lights and road
      void printstat()
      Prints the statics of the traffic system
      void step()
      steps the car forward in the array(road) aswell as the lights and the time.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • step

        public void step()
        steps the car forward in the array(road) aswell as the lights and the time. It also makes new cars to put in on the array(road) and takes out the old ones at the light. It does everything.

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints out the simulation of the traffic system which includes lights and road

      • getcarsin

        public int getcarsin()
        Counts how many cars that drive into the roads.
        Returns:
        The number of cars that drove into the system.

      • getcarsout

        public int getcarsout()
        Counts how many cars that drive out from the roads.
        Returns:
        The number of cars that drove out of the system.

      • getleft

        public int getleft()
        Count how many cars that turn left.
        Returns:
        The number of cars that turned left in the system.

      • getforward

        public int getforward()
        count how many cars that drive forward.
        Returns:
        The number of cars that drove forward.

      • getTotal

        public int getTotal()
        calculates the average time it takes a car to go thru the system.
        Returns:
        The average time i took a car to drive thru the system.

      • getMax
